document_data.name: Makal of the Pine
document_data.mainbody: '''Makal of the Pine''' was a devious [[druid]] who plagued [[orc]]ish loggers some years before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Sometime before the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Makal used his druidic magics in creation of a bludgeon named ''[[Gnasher (weapon)|Gnasher]]''. The [[club]] was imbued with the spirit of Makal's fierce [[wolverine]] [[animal companion]]. This powerful and dangerous weapons remained in the hands of the druid and on several occasions was used against orc loggers who threatened Makal's forest.

Makal of the Pine was presumed dead by 1369 DR, when the ''Gnasher'' was wielded by the [[Shadow Druids|Shadow Druid]] named [[Dalok]] who plagued the town of [[Trademeet]].
